narrative.iWantTo: the system count total price I have to pay

scenario.title: total sum less than 1500 grn
scenario.step: When user has entered to the rozetka.com.ua
And user goes to the nessessary products page for choosing
And total sum in shopping cart is less than 1500 grn
Then shipping price is 35 grnorg.junit.ComparisonFailure: expected:<[Стоимость доставки бесплатно]> but was:<[35 грн]>
